author: felicity
msg: bug 3974: keep finding little intricacies that make this a real pain to solve completely.  we need to fake the separator so the loop will handle the last header -- but we can't add it to the pristine header, so check for that.  update the test to make sure we catch the last header (via X-Message-Info).
